sentences.en: And the trace programme of a line a arc and a parabola is established.
sentences.cn: 并编制了直线、圆弧和抛物线的轨迹程序.

sentences.en: Construct an animation displaying all pairs of orthogonal tangents to a given parabola.
sentences.cn: 建构一动态绘图.展示给定的抛物线外所有成对的正交切线.

sentences.en: From this one, you would not expect it to behave like a parabola.
sentences.cn: 从这一次，你不会期待它，如抛物线般运动。

sentences.en: It is perfectly reasonable to immediately come to that conclusion because of the symmetry of the parabola.
sentences.cn: 很理所应当的,由于抛物线的对称,立刻就会想到这个结论。

sentences.en: Parabola detection is a fundamental problem in road recognition application.
sentences.cn: 抛物线侦测在道路辨识应用中是个十分重要的议题.

sentences.en: Results show that oxidization of W particles also follows the parabola - straight line oxidization mechanism.
sentences.cn: 研究表明,钨粉粉粒的氧化过程同样遵从抛物线 - 直线氧化机理.

sentences.en: So, we should draw maybe this downward parabola.
sentences.cn: 我们可以画出这样的开口向下的抛物线。

sentences.en: Soviet poet whose collections of verse include Parabola ( 1960 ) and The Triangular Pear ( 1962 ).
sentences.cn: 沃兹涅先斯基,安德烈生于1933苏联诗人,其诗集包括抛物线 ( 1960年 ) 和三角梨 ( 1962年 )

sentences.en: Static oxidation curve is basically parabola.
sentences.cn: 静态氧化曲线基本遵循抛物线规律.

sentences.en: The departure leg would be the mirror image of the inbound path ( a hyperbola or parabola ).
sentences.cn: 离开的路径会是进来路径的镜像,呈现双曲线或是 抛物线 的图形.

sentences.en: The interpolation algorithm a parabola based on principle of one by one comparison is pro - posed.
sentences.cn: 基于逐点比较法的思想,推导出了抛物线的插补算法.

sentences.en: The parabola would control air flow in a way that would lessen the shockwave, NASA says.
sentences.cn: NASA表示,这一抛物线设计可以通过控制气流来减少冲击波的产生.

sentences.en: The plane should follow the parabola.
This paper analyses the problem of the theoretic elongation of post - tensioned steel strand of parabola - shape.
sentences.cn: 摘要分析了后张法预应力抛物线形钢绞线理论伸长值计算问题.

sentences.en: This steep upward a parabola, people show concern about the urgency of the disaster areas.
sentences.cn: 这一条陡峭向上的抛物线, 显示人们对灾区的急切关注.

sentences.en: We continue the above three – phase parabola detection procedure until all the parabolas are detected.
sentences.cn: 重复上述之三阶段抛物线侦测程序,直到所有抛物线均侦测完毕.

words.tran_cn: 抛物线的；比喻的；寓言的

trans.tran_en: a curve in the shape of the imaginary line an object makes when it is thrown high in the air and comes down a little distance away
